name: Brookhurst Boutique Accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I find this a difficult property to review as it was not entirely what I expected. From the website I had anticipated a rather larger property but is actually three guest room accommodation - admittedly to a high standard. The outstanding feature is the hospitality of the owners who go to great lengths to ensure their guests have an enjoyable stay.
reviews.title: Friendly accommodation

reviews.text: Brookhurst is some 10 minutes drive from the centre of Blenheim and well placed for wine country tours. Bedrooms are fitted out to a high standard (although our Silver Room does not have a bath as well as the shower - Gold Room apparently does).
reviews.title: Treated like Old Friends

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This accommodation will offer a pleasant stay and the quiet location ensures a good night's sleep.
reviews.title: One of our NZ Trip highlights

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Brian and Helen were the warmest hosts on our trip. We immediatly felt at home there. Helen is an experienced chef and it shows in her canapes and breakfasts. Brian knows everything about wine and the surrounding area. He even taught me how to make a flat white! They have bikes if you are so inclined. The property and grounds are beautiful. Highly reccommend Brookhurst!
reviews.title: Warm Welcome

aka: Brookhurst Boutique Accommodation Blenheim, Marlborough, New Zealand
description: Brookhurst is a very special Marlborough accommodation. Secluded, peaceful, a haven of rest created with the absolute comfort of our guests in mind. At Brookhurst we offer sumptuous décor in stylish yet relaxed surroundings. There are a range of room options available, complete with well-appointed bathrooms, locally made toiletries, Sky TV and Wireless Internet. Each room is decorated with understated flair and the individual tastes of our guests in mind.When you stay at Brookhurst you are invited to enjoy the simple pleasures of the renowned friendly Marlborough lifestyle with hosts who enjoy sharing their enthusiasm for wine, food and the finer things in life. Guests have at their personal disposal both a large and well-appointed lounge, and a beautiful outdoor garden room.You can enjoy the gardens surrounding Brookhurst and take advantage of the meandering walkways beside the Taylor River at the end of the drive. Bikes and maps are provided for those who are really feeling energetic!And if you want to visit our famous Marlborough vineyards, or perhaps enjoy a meal in one of the local restaurants, we can provide personal recommendations. We also offer chauffeur-driven wine tours in our classic Jaguar. At Brookhurst, we take pride in making all our guests feel very special and welcome. Our aim is always to make your stay a truly memorable one!
